 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂתַר‎</span>] **verb Niph\`al** ==burst or break out==, of tumours (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***have inverted***, or ***cracked, eyelids***, or ***lower lips***; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***lacerate***; Assyrian [***šatâru***] II. ***tear down***; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***destroy***, so Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שתר‎</span> [[BDB#SabDenkm|SabDenkm]]<sup>No. 48, 1. 2</sup>, Biblical Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎סְתַר‎</span> [[Ezra.5.12|Ezra 5:12]]); — 

**Niph\`al** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּשָּֽׂתְרוּ לָהֶם עפלים‎</span> [[1Sam.5.9|1Sam 5:9]] and tumours ***brake out*** to them.
